title: Arrested Development
author: Steve Holt
description: A summary of Arrested Development quotes
body:
# Across from where?

## Michael!

Noâ€¦ but I'd like to be asked! I don't understand the question, and I won't respond to it. We just call it a sausage. I don't understand the question, and I won't respond to it. I don't criticize you! And if you're worried about criticism, sometimes a diet is the best defense.

### Steve Holt!
